page.title: 08A typical day of Mr.Nichols
page.content: My Dad gets up between 9.00 and 9.30 and makes a cup of tea,washes what ever pots need washing.He then cleans the carpet with the vacaum cleaner.At 1.00pm he switches on the television to watch it.He sets off to work at 1.30pm.He turns on the machines and goes down to the canteen till 2.00pm, that's when he starts work.His work is at Bowater Scott factory.His work is the conversion of tissue in to toilet roll which are packed and sent to shops.He likes his jobs and gets alot of job satisfaction.About 5.00pm he goes down to canteen to have some tea. It is usually curry and chips.He carries on his work till 10.00, that's when he comes home.My mum makes him some supper and if there is something good on television they watch it.If there isn't they go to bed.
